text: Robert Wade Niedermayer Jr. (born December 28, 1974) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey player who played 17 National Hockey League (NHL) seasons for the Florida Panthers, Calgary Flames, Anaheim Ducks, New Jersey Devils, and Buffalo Sabres. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 births Category:Anaheim Ducks players Category:Buffalo Sabres players Category:Calgary Flames players Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers Category:Florida Panthers players Category:Ice hockey people from Alberta Category:Living people Category:Medicine Hat Tigers players Category:New Jersey Devils players Category:Sportspeople from Edmonton
title: Rob Niedermayer
